name: Heavy Truck Drive Pro
description: Heavy truck drive pro is the best off-road heavy vehicle driving contest in which needs your full attention. You will never see such an amazing and challenging exciting round.This super heavy vehicle drive is made for those who love to play hard driving and tough parking simulations. You act as a driver of a big company and set the modern luxury 4x4 trucks  and other heavy vehicles of your guests without damaging the the path n pakages. Get ready for most marvelous sporty driving adventure, sit behind the wheels. Make your precision good and land in your unique at right spot.
